about_the_game:
Dive into the retro horror of Don't Wake Up The Dead, an intense survival game that will test your nerves. After a funeral urn was accidentally opened in an old attic, a malevolent spirit has been unleashed. Your mission? Seal the urn before it's too late.

But beware, your only weapon is a flashlight that quickly weakens, and one wrong move could wake the ghost! The key to survival: make no noise ! The faster you move, the more noise you make, and the closer you are to disaster. Every step counts, especially in this house where doors lock randomly with each new game, turning the house into a different maze every time you play.

For an extra layer of competition, a point system and bonus rewards have been added. Race against your friends to see who can seal the ghost fastest while managing noise levels and earning extra points by completing hidden challenges. Strategic gameplay and smart use of bonuses can make all the difference in who comes out on top!



Key Features:

Solo survival or multiplayer (turn-based) to share the terror with friends
A flashlight as your only ally, but it weakens quickly
A delicate balance between speed and stealth: move fast, but not too loud !
Doors lock randomly with each new game, creating a unique maze each time
Point and bonus system to increase competition with rewards for fast, stealthy, and strategic gameplay

Can you seal the urn before the ghost wakes... forever?
